description: Try our easy to follow Vanilla & Golden Syrup Thickshakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vanilla & Golden Syrup Thickshakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g Anzac biscuits, plus extra to serve
0.25 cup golden syrup, plus extra to drizzle

recipeInstructions.text: Place biscuits, custard, milk, ice-cream and syrup in a blender and process until smooth and combined. Drizzle a little extra syrup into glasses. Pour thickshake into glasses. Top with cream and an Anzac biscuit, then serve drizzled with remaining extra syrup.
